pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:5.1: 24. The training rule on moving the upper robes
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:6.2: At that time the nuns stored one of their robes with other nuns and then left to wander around the country with a lower and an upper robe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:6.3: Because they were stored for a long time, the robes became moldy,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:6.4: and the nuns put them out in the sun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.1: And they told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.3: “How can nuns store one of their robes with other nuns and then leave to wander around the country with a lower and an upper robe?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.7: How can nuns store one of their robes with other nuns and then leave to wander around the country with a lower and an upper robe?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:8.1: ‘If a nun does not move her upper robes for more than five days, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:10.1: Does not move her upper robes for more than five days:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:10.2: if she does not wear or sun her five robes for five days, then, when the fifth day has passed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:11.1: If it is more than five days, and she perceives it as more than five days, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:11.2: If it is more than five days, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:11.3: If it is more than five days, but she perceives it as less than five days, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:12.1: If it is less than five days, but she perceives it as more than five days, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:12.2: If it is less than five days, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:12.3: If it is less than five days and she perceives it as less than five days, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:13.2: if she wears or suns the five robes on the fifth day;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:13.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc24:14.1: The fourth training rule is finished.
